DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate vasomotor symptoms (VMS) control of the continuous regimen 17 b estradiol/trimegestone combination.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Estradiol/Trimegestone in Vasomotor Symptoms (VMS) in Post-Menopausal Women.
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy postmenopausal women 45 to 55 years of age inclusive, with at least 1 year of natural occurring amenorrhea, with vasomotor symptoms, with at least 4 hot flushes per day Intact uterus Known or suspected breast carcinoma or estrogendependent neoplasm Undiagnosed abnormal genital bleeding
